text: Ivan Hakman (; 18 January 1955) is a former professional Soviet football defender and coach. ==References == ==External links== * * * Bucovinian footballer Ivan Hakman celebrated his 60th Anniversary (Буковинський футболіст Іван Гакман відсвяткував 60 років). title: Ivan Hakman
